subject: docs(guide): add naming conventions and type handling guidance
body:
Adds three new sections to the AI research output guide:

- Naming conventions: exact consistency rules, Title Case recommendation,
  no abbreviation mixing, wiki-link matching, no trailing punctuation.
  Explains that no format auto-merges duplicates and cross-import
  deduplication does not exist.

- Type assignment (per format): types must pre-exist in the active
  schema, unknown types are not auto-created, only use type: when user
  specifies their schema types. JSON typeId requires exact schema IDs.
  CSV type assignment happens via UI dropdown.

- Connection naming (JSON): consistent labels, consistent direction,
  clear inverse pairs, short lowercase labels.

Also updates the quick reference table for type assignment accuracy.

Tags: docs, import, ai-workflow, naming, types
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: markdown-import
Semver: patch

title: add naming conventions and type handling guidance
